My City App RESTAURANTS MALLS TEMPLE HOTELS
LOCATION" ABOUT"
CATEGORY SCREEN" PLACE SCREEN" DETAIL SCREEN"
Le Langka This restaurant is known for its refined atmosphere and focus on quality ingredients. They specialize in a fusion of Asian and French flavors. It is a great choice for a special occasion or a romantic dinner. Reviews often praise the attentive service and the well executed dishes. Keep in mind they are typically only open for dinner. 132 Z13 Rue Pasteur No. 51, Phnom Penh, Cambodia Phnom Penh Three Rivers Restaurant This family-run establishment offers a more casual dining experience. They are known for their friendly service and a menu that features both local Khmer dishes and some Western options. It is a good place to try traditional Cambodian food in a relaxed setting. The owner is often present and happy to chat with diners. St13, #164, Phnom Penh, Cambodia Banteay Srey Restaurant Banteay Srey focuses on authentic Khmer cuisine. They are known for their flavorful dishes and reasonable prices. It is a popular choice for those wanting to explore the local flavors. They are located near the Royal Palace and National Museum, making it a convenient stop for tourists. Preah Ang Eng St. (13), Phnom Penh, Cambodia Oskar Bistro Phnom Penh This bistro has a more modern and trendy vibe. They offer a mix of international dishes and drinks, making it a good option if you are looking for something different. It is a popular spot for both locals and expats. 159 Preah Sisowath Quay, Phnom Penh, Cambodia Sombok Restaurant Sombok stands out because it is run entirely by women. They offer a menu of Khmer dishes and are known for their commitment to using fresh, local ingredients. It is a great place to support a local business and enjoy delicious food in a comfortable atmosphere. No. 1, Street 154, Preah Sisowath Quay Phnom Penh, Phnom Penh 12200, Cambodia
AEON Mall Phnom Penh This is one of the largest malls in the city, offering a wide range of international and local brands, a supermarket, a food court, a cinema, and an entertainment zone with a bowling alley and arcade games. It is located on Samdech Sothearos Blvd and is open daily from 9 AM to 10 PM. 132 Samdach Sothearos Blvd (3), Phnom Penh, Cambodia.
AEON Mall Sen Sok City This is another AEON mall in Phnom Penh, located in Sen Sok City. It is even larger than the first one and features a similar selection of shops, restaurants, and entertainment options. It also has a unique "forest theme" design with a solar-powered air-conditioning system. It is open daily from 9 AM to 10 PM. St No. 1003, ភ្នំពេញ, Cambodia.
Chip Mong 271 Mega Mall This is a modern mall developed by the Chip Mong Group, a Cambodian conglomerate. It offers a mix of retail stores, a hypermarket, a food court, a cinema, and a playground. It is located on Street 271 and is open daily from 9 AM to 10 PM. Phnom Penh, Cambodia.
Chip Mong Noro Mall This is another Chip Mong mall in Phnom Penh, located in Boeung Keng Kang 1 district. It is a smaller mall compared to the others, but it still provides a convenient shopping experience with a supermarket, a food court, a cinema, and a selection of retail stores. It is open daily from 9 AM to 10 PM. 199 Preah Norodom Blvd (41), Phnom Penh
Olympia Mall This is a mixed-use development that includes a shopping mall, residential buildings, and a hotel. The mall features a supermarket, a food court, a cinema, and a variety of retail stores selling fashion, electronics, and beauty products. It is located on Samdech Monireth Blvd and is open daily from 9 AM to 10 PM Samdech Monireth Blvd, Phnom Penh, Cambodia.
